fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Smash someone at night, killing them. 2 night cooldown.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You will smash past anything that prevents your visit.
- You cannot be the only Zombie (Killing) that spawns.
- When you are attacked for the first time, you gain an Imp, which is effectively the same as a (2577) Browncoat Zombie. This means if you are the only Zombie (Killing) alive then the Zombies will still perform the Factional Kill.
- You cannot perform the Factional Kill.
